website_summaries.verdict: A statement piece with a functional lift table that can be used for multiple purposes. Good-looking craftsmanship fits modern and classic home decor.
pros: Invokes enthusiasm for its unique features
Includes a lift-top table, drawer, and bottom shelf
Has a solid build and handsome deep brown color
Beautifully crafted with faux marble finish
cons: Small children should never be allowed to operate the lift unit, as it could cause injury

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as a Christmas present. It being so heavy I opened it to give to him early but you could see the damage without removing it from box. Pieces of the wood was broken off from table, tray was beyond use. I just taped up box and told UPS to pick it back up that day. Complete waste of my money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie

customer_reviews.title: very solid unit. looks good
customer_reviews.text: i paid 175 bucks like 2 years ago. for that money its great. the usb ports charge my S8 in fast charge mode without a power adapter which is nice. the slide out drawer is handy too.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Copin

customer_reviews.title: Great looking table
customer_reviews.text: Great looking table. A tad darker than expected; otherwise, product is in great condition (no scratches or blemishes). Wife and I are extremely pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Van

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The table is beautiful just as i saw it in the Ashley store. I love the thickness of the wood and the marble look top on the table. We also like that the top lifts up. I highly recommend this coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: We were so please with the results and found that the scratches could be covered easily with a furniture marker
customer_reviews.text: Ours came with a couple of scratches, but we were too excited to get it together. We were so pleased with the results and found that the scratches could be covered easily with a furniture marker. The product is sturdy, useful, and a great improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Rugg

customer_reviews.title: the quality is very good..
customer_reviews.text: More information about what to expect for delivery would have helped us get it on time. But once we finally got it and put it together, the quality is very good...what we hoped for (which may be better than expected : )
customer_reviews.author: aamccaffrey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Table is sturdy and heavy, very pretty. Top chipped during shipping. I hope they package better for others.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.E

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these end tables. They look great, and I love the pull out shelf and charging station.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Harden

customer_reviews.title: Pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I received my table today. Easy instructions for assembling. I am very pleased I will likely purchase the associated end tables also. Delivery arrived 2 days ahead of the indicated date. Price was what got me. Instead of going into the store I chose Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Quitina N. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase furniture online but am so glad I did. The price was great and the quality is unbelievable. The table was packaged with great care.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this table
customer_reviews.text: I really like this table, very heavy and feels solid. It came with a chip on the lift top corner, it's noticeable but very minor. I just hope the chip doesn't get any bigger, so I'll have to find something to cover/seal it.
customer_reviews.author: Rowell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table but damaged
customer_reviews.text: Love this table but arrived damaged. My husband is handy so he had parts and tools to get it fully functional.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great table and a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table to go with matching coffee and end table. The quality is beyond my expectations. One purchase I'm so glad I made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table was perfect. Though, I must say it was very heavyweight. It went together great.
customer_reviews.author: Don Wright

customer_reviews.title: Flawless!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this product met or exceeded our expectations great all-around purchase and the experience of buying it was flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality but extremely heavy. Takes two people to assemble unless you are really strong.
customer_reviews.author: sewingfiend

customer_reviews.title: They look so good together and the quality is great
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of the Chairside End Tables to go with this End Table. They look so good together and the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Quality Furniture
customer_reviews.text: The pullout tray and charging station are nice features. I love this piece. It was purchased along with the pullout coffee table. Very happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: DONNA HACKETT

customer_reviews.title: Table is very pretty. We saw this table in a local store ...
customer_reviews.text: Table is very pretty. We saw this table in a local store and when I found the same one on Amazon, it was quite a bit cheaper so I ordered this. It is the same table we saw locally and we like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: If you look at other places, it's a higher price....can't beat the price...perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: darker wood than picture
customer_reviews.text: Bought to match new office furniture and although sturdy with nice feature of built in power strip, the wood is very dark. If it were true to the picture (more reddish), it would have matched but now with all new office furniture I still have unmatched pieces. It does have a beautiful faux marble top - very smooth. All you need to assemble is attach the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Dar W

product_meta.title: Ashley Furniture Signature Design - Kraleene Round Lift Top Coffee Table - 1 Fixed Shelf - Contemporary Living - Dark Brown
product_meta.description: The “Kraleene” accent table collection features thick stock legs and a clean post frame bathed within a woody brown finish supporting a thick faux stone patterned table top protected with a shiny polyurethane coating. With the functionality of the lift-top cocktail table and an end table that features a power strip with USB charging capabilities, this collection is sure to enhance any living area.
feature_bullets: CONTEMPORARY COCKTAIL TABLE: Enhance your space with this clean-lined table. The almost black palette fuses with the marble for an elegant, modern finish you'll be proud to use
BEAUTIFULLY CRAFTED: Tables are hand-finished and made of veneers, wood and engineered wood. Top is faux marble with a protective polyurethane finish
LIFT-TOP DESIGN: The easy lift-top allows you to conveniently enjoy a morning cup of coffee or late night meal by the living room TV
STORAGE SOLUTION: With 1 drawer and 1 fixed shelf, you have ample room to store daily essentials–and then some. Table measures 38.25" W x 38.25" D x 19.25" H
ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: Easy-to-follow instructions, tools and hardware included
DIRECT FROM THE MANUFACTURER: Ashley Furniture goes the extra mile to package, protect and deliver your purchase in a timely manner

BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Designed and manufactured by Ashley Furniture Industries. The trusted source for stylish furniture, lighting, rugs, accessories and mattresses. For every taste and budget. Since 1945

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars34 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
